get.summary: Retrieves the collection of BlogPost resources.

parameters.description: Allows you to reduce the response to contain only the properties you need. If your desired property is nested, you can address it using nested arrays. Example: properties[]={propertyName}&properties[]={anotherPropertyName}&properties[{nestedPropertyParent}][]={nestedProperty}
parameters.name: properties[]

GetBlogPostItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /api/blog_posts/{id}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Comment resources.
Retrieves the collection of Image resources.
Retrieves the collection of Comment resources.

GetCommentItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /api/comments/{id}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Image resources.

GetImageItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /api/images/{id}`.

GetUserItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /api/users/{id}`.
